probability

Class GaussianMixtureModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • probability.ProbabilityModel
      • probability.GaussianMixtureModel

  • public class GaussianMixtureModel
extends ProbabilityModel
    Class that implements a simple GaussianMixture model as an array of Gaussian distributions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GaussianMixtureModel(Cluster[] samples)
      Learn a GMM from a set of clusters where each cluster corresponds to a single Gaussian distribution.
      GaussianMixtureModel(GaussianModel[] models) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Calculate how likely it is for a given float feature vector to have originated from any of the modeled Gaussians.

      Calculate how likely it is for a given float feature vector to have originated from any of the modeled Gaussians.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GaussianMixtureModel

        public GaussianMixtureModel(GaussianModel[] models)
        Parameters:
        models - An array of Gaussian models composing the mixture.

      • GaussianMixtureModel

        public GaussianMixtureModel(Cluster[] samples)
        Learn a GMM from a set of clusters where each cluster corresponds to a single Gaussian distribution.
        Parameters:
        samples - An array of clusters.

    • Method Detail

      • calcProbArray

        public double[] calcProbArray(float[] x)
        Calculate how likely it is for a given float feature vector to have originated from any of the modeled Gaussians.
        Parameters:
        x - A float array representing a feature vector.
        Returns:
        An array of likelihoods of the feature vector originating from the modeled Gaussian distributions.

      • calcProbArray

        public double[] calcProbArray(DataInstance instance)
        Calculate how likely it is for a given float feature vector to have originated from any of the modeled Gaussians.
        Parameters:
        instance - DataInstance object.
        Returns:
        An array of likelihoods of the data instance originating from the modeled Gaussian distributions.

      • calcTestDataProbabilities

        public double[] calcTestDataProbabilities(DataInstance[] testArray)
        Specified by:
        calcTestDataProbabilities in class ProbabilityModel
        Parameters:
        testArray - DataInstance[] that is the test data array.
        Returns:
        double[] that are the probabilities of the test data points given the model.

      • calcDataPointClass

        public int calcDataPointClass(DataInstance instance)
        Calculate the class (model index) that an instance is most likely to have originated from.
        Parameters:
        instance - DataInstance object.
        Returns:
        The index of the most likely model.
